main_definition: Messages refer to written or electronic communications sent from one person to another, typically conveying information, news, or greetings.

meanings_and_examples.definition: A form of communication in digital platforms
meanings_and_examples.example: I received several messages on my social media account today.
The app sent me a message when I completed the task successfully.

meanings_and_examples.definition: Letters, emails, or text messages exchanged between individuals
meanings_and_examples.example: She wrote him a heartfelt message to express her gratitude.

meanings_and_examples.definition: Messages from someone in authority such as government agencies
meanings_and_examples.example: I got an official message about my tax return status.
